page.title: 09 DAVID'S WEDNESDAY
page.content: I get up out of my bunk bed at 08:30.I have the top bed.It takes me about 7 minutes to get dressed and washed.I have to get my own swimming stuff ready because my mum goes to work about 06:45. I have no breakfast because I have to lock up and zoom off to school. At school I have to be in and working at 09:00. We do English on wednesday morning from 09:00 to 10:50. Now it is time for a 10 minutes play. When we get in we get our swimming stuff and coats. When we arrive at the swimming baths we have to wait at the entrance until a teacher comes.When we have got changed I go and have a shower.I am in Mrs Harker's group. We go down the deep end.At the end of the lesson we go down the slide and swim down to the other end.When we get back to school it is dinner time.We do basic work in the afternoon.
